sentences.translation: 他招了两位懂多种语言的工程师。

sentences.sentence: Very few restaurant menus have translations, and multilingual waiters, bank clerks and policemen are rare.
sentences.translation: 很少有餐厅的菜单有翻译，会说多种语言的服务员、银行职员和警察也很少。

sentences.sentence: In fact, most children outside of the United States are expected to become bilingual or even, in many cases, multilingual.
sentences.translation: 事实上，大多数美国以外的孩子都被期望成为双语者，或者——在很多情况下——甚至是多语者。
